actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution relating to the issuance of a special postage stamp commemorating the World Food Conference.

summary.text: Directs the United States Postal Service to issue a special postage stamp commemorating the World Food Conference held in Rome November 5 through November 16, 1974.

titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the issuance of a special postage stamp commemorating the World Food Conference.
